entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • build error: non-private labels cannot appear between .cfi_startproc / .cfi_endproc pairs #108823
  • linux-x64 debug Libraries_AllConfigurations fails to complete the build #108821
  • Unnecessary sign extension in `Vector512.Create(sbyte)` and `Vector512.Create(short)` #108820
  • Process.Start opens explorer itself instead of URL #108817
  • ReadECDsaPrivateKey_BrainpoolP160r1_Pfx test failure on windows #108815

Closed

  • Logger scopes should only apply to the specific logger that they had begun on #108826

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix PKCS#12 to use SHA1 MAC #108825
    area-System.Security
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Crossgen2 outer loop fixes #108819
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Clean up in importervectorization.cpp #108818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 129.0.6668.100, windows: 130.0.6723.44 #108816
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Update source-build team references #108802
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable linux-x64 dev-innerloop #108581
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP] WebSocket stress #108770
    area-System.Net
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
